_header: A man is a mirrour of sorrow and woe
Subjects: human life, transitory nature of; transitoriness, of life
_description: The ephemeral nature of man — two couplets

HerefordO35.Transcription:
A man is a mirrour of soro & of woA man is a somer flour þat
                    sone vill gooA man is a tre of tenefull tylyng& a man is a reue of
                    ruful rekynyng
